meaningMnemonic:
When your shoulders get a little こり, it means you've got <vocabulary>shoulder stiffness</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>stiff neck</vocabulary>. 

The こり here is a nominalized version of the verb こる, which means "to become stiff," so maybe that'll help you remember this!
readingMnemonic: You already know the reading of 肩, and this is just that with some hiragana added on!
